description: Todo list where you can add and clear tasks. Built with Redux reducers and actions

description: Video header with JavaScript navbar, CSS grid and JavaScript accordion.

title: Mobile application built with React Native
description: Fetching cocktails from an API with the accelerometer sensor

description: Trivia quiz built in Redux. Displays correct/incorrect answers as well as a summary with charts

description: Backend project building an API with Next.js. Frontend built with React.

description: Movie releases website built with React that fetches new, up coming and popular movies

description: Survey built with React where you can find a game that matches your profile.

description: Chat bot that gives you song recommendations based on your mood
